items.sentence: Tom and Mary have been dating on and off for a year.
She can speak French, and is even better at English.
Tom has an old felt hat he always wears in the rain.
Tom has been trying to find out who killed his wife.
The shirt Tom is wearing doesn\'t fit him very well.
I think that I understand what Tom\'s trying to say.
Tom told Mary that he had never intended to do that.
Tom told Mary that he was going to try to help John.
Tom certainly sunk a lot of money into his business.
Tom seemed to enjoy watching Mary and John fighting.
